title: Pit Praisers | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Pit Praisers | Joel Osteen
description:
It takes faith to praise God in the good times and the tough times. When you're grateful regardless of your circumstances, God's presence will fill your life in new ways. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
